subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[xiao]], a vertical, notched, end-blown [[bamboo]] [[flute]] used since ancient times in Chinese traditional and classical music (also called {{zh-l|洞簫}})
# a musical instrument like [[pan-pipes]] (also called {{zh-l|排簫}})
# {{surname|lang=zh|dot=:}} [[Xiao]]
